title: siamaro
author: siamaro
content: Binomo, an unregulated broker claiming membership in the Financial Commission, has been accused of engaging in fraudulent activities. This includes closing accounts without justification, stealing deposits, manipulating market movements, and victimizing numerous investors. In this complaint, we will delve into the specific tactics employed by Binomo and discuss potential strategies for gathering evidence against them.1. Lack of Regulation and Exploitation:Binomo takes advantage of its unregulated status, allowing them to operate with minimal oversight. This creates an environment where they can manipulate accounts and engage in illicit activities without consequences. As an investor, it's crucial to be aware of the risks associated with unregulated brokers.2. Unjustified Account Closures:One common complaint against Binomo is the arbitrary closure of accounts. Numerous users have reported having their accounts terminated without any valid reason provided. These closures often occur even when users have not violated any terms or conditions, raising concerns about the transparency and integrity of Binomo's operations. (they have access to the server they can easily manipulate the databases and fake the proofs i don't suspect if they even have insiders into the financial commission to launch such fraudlent business which based on closing high profits investors accounts especially in the arabics and other poor countries where those poor people don't have money and experience to hire lawyers or companies to deal in such cases in the other hand they're blocking multiple strong countries like usa canada and the european countries to avoid the problems ! many  youtubers have exposed them aleardy but no body is moving )3. Payment Rejections and Deposit Theft:Your personal experience with Binomo is unfortunately not unique. Many investors have fallen victim to rejected payments and subsequent loss of funds. In your case, the deposit made via Bitcoin was deducted from your wallet but was ultimately rejected, resulting in stolen funds. Such incidents contribute to a growing body of evidence against Binomo's fraudulent practices.4. Manipulation of Market Movements:Binomo's manipulation of market movements, particularly through candlestick charts, is another alarming issue. There have been instances where users suspect foul play, with prices not reflecting the actual market conditions. This manipulation can lead to substantial financial losses for unsuspecting investors.5.  Proofs: recently i made out a payment through bitcoin currency through a deposit and 24h hours have been passed and the money have beeen deducted from my wallet and they rejected the payment  and stole my money again ! i'll try get strong proofs against them how they steal deposits money how they play with candles how they close accounts for no reason ! t binomo have aleardy scammed a lot of my friends Conclusion:Binomo's fraudulent practices and unscrupulous behavior pose a significant risk to investors.
